problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠B=∠C,D为BC边上一点,E点在AC边上,∠ADE=∠AED,若∠BAD=24°,则∠CDE=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = ∠C, D is a point on edge BC, point E is on edge AC, ∠ADE = ∠AED, if ∠BAD = N_0, then ∠CDE = ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:∵∠ADC是△ABD的外角,∴∠ADC=∠B+∠BAD=∠B+24°,∵∠AED是△CDE的外角,∴∠AED=∠C+∠EDC,∵∠B=∠C,∠ADE=∠AED,∴∠C+∠EDC=∠ADC-∠EDC=∠B+24°-∠EDC,解得∠EDC=12°．
